extension.summary: Ovaj add-on ne sadrzi nikakav sadrzaj unutar add-ona vec samo linkove koji vode do strimova. Za vise informacija [COLOR=cyan]Facebook[/COLOR] group : [COLOR=limegreen]CobraModTVPro[/COLOR].
This add-on does not contain any content within the add-on, but only the links that lead to streams. More information on [COLOR cyan]Facebook[/COLOR] Group: [COLOR=limegreen]CobraModTVPro[/COLOR]
extension.description: Addon je namijenjen za Balkan,World Tv,Filmer,Series and Kids Movies[COLOR=cyan]Facebook[/COLOR] group : [COLOR=limegreen]CobraModTVPro[/COLOR]
The addon is intended for Balkan,World Tv,Filmer,Series and Kids Movies.[COLOR=cyan]Facebook[/COLOR] group : [COLOR=limegreen]CobraModTVPro[/COLOR].

[B]Robin Hood Tv Pro[/B][CR] [B]***OpenScrapers Edition***[/B][CR][CR]This addon does not form part of the Kodi Media Centre. Please do not seek assistance with this addon from any of the Official Kodi Support Channels.[CR][CR]The author does not host any of the content in this addon and takes no responsibility for content found.
extension.disclaimer: The author of this addon do not host any of the content which is found and have no affiliation with any of the content providers. This addon simply searches websites for content. Use at your own risk!
extension.news: Nova verzija addon-a [COLOR limegreen]RobinHood[/COLOR] [COLOR lime]T[/COLOR][COLOR lime]v[/COLOR][COLOR lime]P[/COLOR][COLOR limero[/COLOR] [COLOR white]Addon[/COLOR]. Verzija: 1.0.2. Dodani novi kanali, linkovi, ispravljeni nedostatci, izmijenjen izgled i funkcionalnost addona. Za vise informacija [COLOR=deepskyblue]Facebook[/COLOR] group :[COLOR=limegreen]RobinHood[COLOR=lime]TvPro[/COLOR].

Added new channels, new links, new streams, fixed bugs, changed layout and functionality of addon.
